text: The Road to Berth () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Georgiy Daneliya.Молодые чеченские актеры приехали в Ессентуки представлять картину о захвате заложников во время спектакляПУТЬ К ПРИЧАЛУ It stars Boris Andreyev, Oleg Zhakov, and Lyubov Sokolova. == Actors == * Boris Andreyev as Zosima Rosomakha * Oleg Zhakov as Georgiy Gastev * Lyubov Sokolova as Mariya * Aleksandr Metyolkin as Vaska Metyolkin * Valentin Nikulin as Marat Lepin * Bruno O'Ya as Bruno == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1962 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Georgiy Daneliya Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Road to Berth
